text: includes small retail and other commercial units that meet the needs of fashion retailers, restaurants, and bars. Columbia Road is known across London for its Sunday flower market and for its mix of small artisanal businesses and village-like character. This character will be supported by ensuring that the commercial units remain very small in size and by resisting any consolidation of ground floor commercial units. Hackney Wick contains a unique mix of industrial and leisure uses, including a regionally significant cluster of arts production and consumption spaces, as well as a strong night-time economy. This areaâ€™s unique character will be protected and enhanced by retaining existing arts, employment BACK TO POLICIES and leisure uses and ensuring that new development is mixed-use and supports the Creative Enterprise Zone designation.
